plot: Another film version of the Karl Vollmoller-Max Reinhardt spectacle, made in the same year that Reinhardt himself filmed his own version.
title: Das Mirakel
plot_es: Another film version of the Karl Vollmoller-Max Reinhardt spectacle, made in the same year that Reinhardt himself filmed his own version.
